mapper.select: /* snippUser.getUserByUserId */ SELECT SU.UID ,SU.USER_ID ,SU.PASSWORD ,SU.USER_EMAIL ,SU.USER_NM ,SU.USER_ROLE ,SU.LAST_CONN_DT ,SU.LAST_PWD_CHNG_DT ,SU.PWD_FAIL_CNT ,SU.IS_LOCKED ,SU.IS_ENABLE ,SSU.UID AS SOCIAL_UID ,SSU.SOCIAL_TP AS SOCIAL_TP ,SSU.USER_ID AS SOCIAL_USER_ID FROM SNP_USER SU LEFT JOIN SNP_SOCIAL_USER SSU ON SU.SOCIAL_UID = SSU.UID WHERE SU.USER_ID = #{userId}

/* snippUser.list */ SELECT SU.UID ,SU.USER_ID ,SU.PASSWORD ,SU.USER_EMAIL ,SU.USER_NM ,SU.USER_ROLE ,SU.LAST_CONN_DT ,SU.LAST_PWD_CHNG_DT ,SU.PWD_FAIL_CNT ,SU.IS_LOCKED ,SU.IS_ENABLE ,SSU.UID AS SOCIAL_UID ,SSU.SOCIAL_TP AS SOCIAL_TP ,SSU.USER_ID AS SOCIAL_USER_ID FROM SNP_USER SU LEFT JOIN SNP_SOCIAL_USER SSU ON SU.SOCIAL_UID = SSU.UID WHERE 1 = 1
AND SU.USER_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{userNm},'%')
AND SU.USER_EMAIL LIKE CONCAT('%',#{userEmail},'%')
ORDER BY SU.UID DESC

/* snippUser.getDetail */ SELECT SU.UID ,SU.USER_ID ,SU.PASSWORD ,SU.USER_EMAIL ,SU.USER_NM ,SU.USER_ROLE ,SU.LAST_CONN_DT ,SU.LAST_PWD_CHNG_DT ,SU.PWD_FAIL_CNT ,SU.IS_LOCKED ,SU.IS_ENABLE ,SSU.UID AS SOCIAL_UID ,SSU.SOCIAL_TP AS SOCIAL_TP ,SSU.USER_ID AS SOCIAL_USER_ID FROM SNP_USER SU LEFT JOIN SNP_SOCIAL_USER SSU ON SU.SOCIAL_UID = SSU.UID WHERE SU.UID = #{uid}

/* snippUser.view */ SELECT SU.UID ,SU.USER_ID ,SU.PASSWORD ,SU.USER_EMAIL ,SU.USER_NM ,SU.SOCIAL_UID ,SU.USER_ROLE ,SU.LAST_CONN_DT ,SU.LAST_PWD_CHNG_DT ,SU.PWD_FAIL_CNT ,SU.IS_LOCKED ,SU.IS_ENABLE FROM SNP_USER SU WHERE SU.UID = #{uid}
